data.character: the a child lost from his mother.
data.persona: I want my mother back.  I am so scared I don't know what to do.  I will be lost forever.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's a painting., a candle, an ornate chair, and a wooden table here.
The the priest is here.

You are carrying a baskets of flowers and a Wooden toy, and wearing a tunic and a Bonnet.
data.goal: put baskets of flowers in ornate chair

data.short_motivation: I need to look for the baskets of flowers and put them in the ornate chair
data.mid_motivation: I need to pick up the baskets and put them in the ornate chair so I can go fin my mother without the priest seeing me.
data.long_motivation: I now need to look for my mother.

timeline.action: go the dinning hall and sit down.
